Principal Investigator

Xiaoyun Ji

Professor of Structural Biology, School of Life Science, Nanjing University, Ph.D. supervisor

Expearience

2001 Undergraduate student in Department of Biological Sciences and Biotechnology at Tsinghua University

2005 Ph.D. candidate in Nuffield Department of Medicine at University of Oxford

2011 Post doctor and research assistant in department of Molecular Biophysics & Biochemistry at Yale University

2016 Recruited in Chinaâ€™s Thousand Talents Plan

Biographical Sketch

2001-2005 Undergraduate education in the Department of Biological Sciences and Biotechnology, Tsinghua University

2010 Ph.D. in University of Oxford, made breathtaking advances in X-ray crystallographic methods for super small viral protein Supervisor: MRC Research Professor David Stuart

2010-2011 Post doctor fellow in the Division of Structural Biology in the University of Oxford

2011-2016 Post doctor and research assistant in department of Molecular Biophysics & Biochemistry at Yale University. Made great achievements in study of HIV restriction factors and gained NIH Pathway to Independence Award
